TopicTitle: Loading a saved game in Duna atmosphere makes the game hang

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Win10 | CPU: 5800 x3d | GPU: 7800 xt | RAM: 32 GB

 

As the tile says, loading a saved game in Duna atmosphere makes the game hang, the loading screen with the green progress bar does not show up, instead the game is stuck on  the initial splash screen forever.

Workaround I found:  Loading a saved game works once after killing the game and  starting the game fresh from desktop.
